comments:
build I20030605

Saw the following in my log today, from my session yesterday.  Sorry, I don't 
know exactly what caused it.
The package org.eclipse.ui.views.markers.internal was recently created.
At the point this was logged, it's possible it existed in HEAD but not in my 
workspace.

Also, the "Cannot close connection" messages are a bit disconcerting.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.cvs.core 4 -6 Jun 09, 2003 22:14:10.729
!MESSAGE Cannot close connection

This is a good reminder that we need to review how we retreive and interpret the
return values of IContainer::members(true /*include phantoms*/). 

Basically, unless you are looking for all phantom resources you have to check
the sync info type before considering the phantom as interesting in the context
of your operation.
Did the member check a while ago, no problems found.
